name: hr-management-system
description: HR Management System - Full Stack Application

scripts.dev:safe: node scripts/fix-ports.js && concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend:hr"
scripts.dev:dual: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend:hr" "npm run dev:frontend:employee"
scripts.dev:dual:safe: node scripts/fix-ports.js && concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend:hr" "npm run dev:frontend:employee"
scripts.dev:frontend:hr: cd frontend && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=4096 PORT=3001 npm run dev
scripts.dev:frontend:employee: cd frontend && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=4096 PORT=3002 npm run dev
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
